title: Selective COX-2 inhibitors from natural sources: Insights from the analysis of components absorbed into blood from Isatidis Radix Lignans.
abstract: Isatis tinctoria L. (Isatidis Radix) is a type of Chinese medicine used to treat various inflammations. Lignans are the main active ingredients of Isatidis Radix, which exhibit potent anti-inflammatory properties. However, the targets underlying the anti-inflammatory effects of Isatidis Radix remain unclear.
